usefulItems: 12-hole muffin tray, cupcake liners, wooden skewer, wire rack, sealable container, oven
title: Camille carrot and almond cakes

ingredients.content: 200 g carrots, cut into pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 170°C. Line a 12-hole muffin tray with cupcake liners and set aside.
Place sugar and raw almonds into mixing bowl and mill <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>.
Add carrots and chop 10 sec/speed 7. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add orange juice, eggs, oil, milk, flour and sea salt and combine <b>15 sec/speed 7<b>.

Add baking powder and mix <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Pour cake mixture into prepared cupcake liners and sprinkle with flaked almonds. Bake for 20-25 minutes (170°C), or until a wooden skewer inserted into the centre of one of the cakes comes out clean.
Place cakes onto a wire rack to cool completely. Serve immediately or transfer into a sealable container to store.
